name: 4 Cupcake Creature Buttons
description: This set includes one cupcake snail on a pastel green background, one whale cupcake on a pastel blue background, one turtle cupcake on a pastel purple background, and one crab cupcake on a pastel orange background. Pins measure 1.75 inches and would look great on a jacket, backpack, scarf, shirt, etc. Need more than four? These pins would make great favors for a party. Please contact me for a custom listing. Prefer a mirror or a magnet with the same design? Please contact me and I will create a different listing for you. Cupcake Creatures: Where did the idea come from? Well I created these little creatures while I was at my mum’s house in Aslackby, England this past Christmas. Aslackby in my opinion is the cake capital of the world and every house you visit always has multiple handmade desserts for you to try. The first cupcake creature I made was a duck cake. The idea of combining two of my favorite things was just so fabulous I had to share it with all of you. I have now created a turtle, armadillo, snail, walrus, elephant, toadstool, camel, whale, frog, goat, cow, duck, chick, octopus, hippo, goldfish and starfish. I am sure there will be more to come. Cupcake Creatures are drawn in my sketchbook when I have a lot of time on my hands… like when I am stuck at the airport for 12 hours, when I can’t sleep at night, or when my husband is watching every football game on Sunday. I scan them into my computer and digitally color them in like a coloring book in my graphics software. I print the images at home using photo quality inks and premium paper and cut them out by hand. I use my muscles and my Tecre button machine to make them into mirrors, magnets, and pins. Handmade by Eve 2008

name: Yellow Chick Pocket Mirror
description: Peep! Peep! Peep! Pocket Mirror is 2 1/4 inches (5.5 cm) and will fit in a handbag, purse, backpack, pocket, etc. Need more than one? These mirrors would make great favors for a party. Please contact me for a custom listing. Prefer a pin or a magnet with the same design? Please contact me and I will create a different listing for you. Hand Created & Designed by Eve 2007 Birds My sketchbooks are full of all different types of birds including chickens, chicks, robins, crows, flamingoes, parrots, toucans, etc. I really enjoy making them expressive and I also enjoy making their feet. These birds are drawn in my sketchbook when I have a lot of time on my hands… like when I am stuck at the airport for 12 hours, when I can’t sleep at night, or when my husband is watching every football game on Sunday. I scan them into my computer and digitally color them in like a coloring book in my graphics software. I print the images at home using photo quality inks and premium paper and cut them out by hand. I use my muscles and my Tecre button machine to make them into mirrors, magnets, and pins.
